definition: Yip Man (1893-1972), martial arts practitioner, master of Bruce Lee

surname Ye
to be in harmony
to ask

sentences.english: 'The character is very much different from what audiences have seen before, ' he continued.
sentences.chinese: 他接着说，这个角色和观众以前看到的叶问非常不同。

sentences.english: The film YeWen on Friday at New Time Cinema.
sentences.chinese: 电影《叶问》星期五在新时代电影院上演。

sentences.english: After that encounter, Yip Man continued to learn from Leung Bik.
sentences.chinese: 经过这次遭遇以后，叶问又跟着梁壁学习武术。

sentences.english: In this video we meet sifu Ip Chun, son and successor of none other than Ip Man.
sentences.chinese: 本视频送上叶问之子叶准师傅的专访。

sentences.english: Likewise the first IP Man was a typical action martial arts classic.
sentences.chinese: 同样的《叶问》也是一个经典的动作电影。

sentences.english: His students included a young Bruce Lee.
sentences.chinese: 叶问的弟子之一就是年轻时代的李小龙。
